lyrics: marigrahabandhanaya ehi ehi agaccha agaccha aveshaya aveshaya
mama hridaye praveshaya praveshaya sphura sphura prasphura prasphura satyam kathaya
shatrumukhabandhana sarvamukhabandhana lankaprasadabhanjana amukam me vashamanaya
kleem kleem kleem hreem shreem shreem rajanam vashamanaya
shreem hreem kleem striya akarshaya akarshaya shatrunmardaya mardaya maraya maraya
om hram hreem hrum hraim hraum hrah phat svaha
vichitravira hanumat mama sarvashatrun bhasmikuru kuru
ekadashashatavaram japitva sarvashatrun vashamanayati nanyatha iti
